tool_description: Extracts zoning classification data, regulations, and boundaries for specified jurisdictions and geographic areas.

jurisdiction.description: Name or identifier of the jurisdiction (city, county, etc.)

area_type.description: Type of area to analyze: neighborhood, district, city, county

area_identifier.description: Specific identifier for the area (name, code, or coordinates)

include_regulations.description: Whether to include detailed zoning regulations

error_messages: Invalid jurisdiction: The specified jurisdiction name or identifier is not recognized in the database.
Invalid area type: Use one of [neighborhood, district, city, county].
Area not found: The specified area_identifier could not be located within the given jurisdiction.
No zoning data available: Zoning information is not available for this area.
usage: Specify the jurisdiction, area_type, and area_identifier to extract zoning data. Set include_regulations to false for basic classification data only.

zoning_districts.description: List of zoning district codes found in the area

last_updated.description: Date when zoning data was last updated
